text: Suhdulah pur satan is a Gram panchayat in hajipur, vaishali district, bihar. ==Geography== This panchayat is located at ==panchayat office== panchayat bhawan Sadullahpur (पंचायत भवन Sadullahpur ) Panchayati Raj Department,Government of Bihar page number 7 ==Nearest City/Town== Hajipur (Distance 7 KM) village profile census government official website State - Bihar, District- vaishali, Sub District - Hajipur ==Nearest major road highway or river== SATAN NH 19 (National highway 19 )( nearest highway ) Map - vaishali district official government website file type: image/jpeg, size:13.9 MB ==compass== The Chief Electoral Officer of Bihar official,hajipur pdf ==Villages in panchayat== There are villages in this panchayatReports of National Panchayat Directory Ministry of Panchayati Raj Government of India List of Census Villages mapped for SUHDULAH PUR SATAN Gram Panchayat,HAJIPUR,VAISHALI,BIHAR Report printed on 26/09/2014 National Panchayat Portal,Panchayat Informatics Division {|class="wikitable" |- !s.n | !villages |- | 1||||Rampur Nawsahan |- | 2||||Sadullahpur Satan |- | 3||||Arazi Saidpur Ganesh |- | 4||||SadullahpurSatanurfMujwar Chak |- | 5||||Arazi Sultanpur |- | 6||||Imadpur Sultan |- | |} ==References== Category:Villages in Vaishali district Category:Vaishali district Category:Hajipur
